Eric wrote:
> I could swear I've used this in 1.8.0 in the past, but now it's not
> working for me.  I put in a regex and click "Display URIs" and it
> shows some, then with the same regex I click "Delete URIs" and it
> tells me "All 0 URIs matching .* were deleted."  I.e., nothing
> happened.  There's nothing in the logs and heritrix_out.log with all
> the debug options I can find turned on just says:
> admin [16/Jul/2006:02:00:22 +0000] "POST /console/frontier.jsp HTTP/1.1" 200 10841
> 
> Does anyone else have this problem?  It looks to me like this was a
> bug that was closed last December (#1333669),

This works in my tests using the default BdbFrontier.

Are you using an alternate/patched Frontier?

Is your crawl paused? (Though you aren't displayed a link to the 
iew/Edit Frontier page from a running crawl, you could access the page 
directly, or keep a browser up pointed to that page in a running crawl.)

- Gordon @ IA
